body: Hi Rania, by RayMan and ENVImet. From ENVImet i have 4 values (MRT, wind speed, relative humidity and potential temperature, so if you put these values in rayman you can obtain PMV, PET, SET and UTCI (this one from ladybug as well). At this moment i am working on a little component that will able to convert PMV to PET, because some researchers ([http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1877705812016876](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1877705812016876)) have demonstrated the existence of an equivalence scale between these two comfort indexes (maybe it's not properly correct, but i need only an indication in my thesis about it). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/nBD8FQWarq*u9JEgfxXsvtSisJXnuOLiml-b1HbOdKqt*Qipo8CAHNXz2dnkz7ILS7XcMiJVs2eG32Df*23mpMv-1J4Wc82v/PMVtoPET.png)PS.: i've used: -4<PMV<4;
